mapper.insert: insert into free_board(board_no, member_id, board_title, board_contents, create_date) values (#{boardDto.boardNo}, #{boardDto.memberId}, #{boardDto.boardTitle}, #{boardDto.boardContents}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo , member_id memberId , board_title boardTitle , board_contents boardContents , board_read boardRead , create_date createDate , update_date updateDate FROM free_board ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT board_no boardNo , member_id memberId , board_title boardTitle , board_contents boardContents , board_read boardRead , create_date createDate , update_date updateDate FROM free_board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
